text: Xantolis is a genus of trees and shrubs in the family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1838.Rafinesque, Constantine Samuel. 1838. Sylva Telluriana page 36, listing 168 diagnosis in Latin, commentary in EnglishTropicos, Xantolis Raf. Xantolis is native to Asia (India to southern China to Singapore and the Philippines.World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesFlora of China Vol. 15 Page 209 刺榄属 ci lan shu Xantolis Rafinesque, Sylva Tellur. 36. 1838. ;Species ==References== Category:Chrysophylloideae Category:Sapotaceae genera Category:Flora of Asia
title: Xantolis
